question: Which was the first cholera vaccine approved in the US?
ideal_answer: Vaxchora is the first vaccine approved by the Food and Drug Administration for the prophylaxis of cholera infection.

snippets.text: Vaxchora: The First FDA-Approved Cholera Vaccination in the United States.
Vaxchora is the first vaccine approved by the Food and Drug Administration for the prophylaxis of cholera infection.
